Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Just as a sandalwood tree cannot impart its fragrance to others without breeze and without the air of malay mountain, how can the atmosphere become fragranced,

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy ibnu bYd AvKd gun goip hoq; AvKd ibnu bYd rogih n gRws hY [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Just as a physician know the merit of every herb or medicine and without medicine, no physician can cure an ailing person,

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Just as no one can cross the ocean without sailor nor can it be crossed without a ship,

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy gur nwmu ibnu gMm n prmpdu; ibnu gur nwm inhkwm n pRgws hY [516[

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Similarly without the boon of Lord's name given by the True Guru, God cannot be realised. And without Naam the liberator from the worldly desires and blessed by the True Guru, no one can acquire spiritual effulgence.  (516)
